subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: As Peter Velits raced to victory at Peñafiel, Vincenzo Nibali regained the overall lead from Joaquin Rodriguez in the Vuelta a España.
snippet: As Peter Velits raced to victory at Peñafiel, Vincenzo Nibali regained the overall lead from Joaquin Rodriguez in the Vuelta a España.
